trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Buford
There were no other sightings in Buford on or around September 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsStar like dot,Then pulsed twice, thought was satellite, until it headed 260 deg SW to horizon. Then did a very quick zig zag motion and headed 29 deg NE following horizon. Kept heading NE blinked twice then gone.
Summary: Star like dot,Then pulsed twice, thought was satellite headed 260 deg SW. then did a zig zag motion and headed west. kept heading west blinked twice then gone.
